snippet.title: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy - Story Trailer
snippet.description:
The Amerzone…

That mysterious land is both the source of my greatest joys… and my deepest disgrace.”
This sentence full of regrets, whispered by the explorer Valembois, will lead you on a deep initiatory quest, dotted with discoveries, encounters and secrets…

Set off in search of the Great White Birds in a mysterious land full of secrets when Amerzone - The Explorer's Legacy lands on PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X and PC in the end of 2024.

🕊️ Add Amerzone - The Explorer's Legacy to your wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2429190/Amerzone__The_Explorers_Legacy/

Also on :
Epic Game Store: https://store.epicgames.com/fr/p/amerzone-the-explorers-legacy-remake-88464f
GOG: https://www.gog.com/fr/game/amerzone_remake_the_explorers_legacy
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/fr-fr/concept/10008226
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/fr-fr/games/store/lamerzone-le-testament-de-lexplorateur/9mxtn71qmqwk
